description: This file defines core data structures and enumerations used in the game logic for a Snake game, including Direction and Point2D classes, with utility methods for movement and randomness.

classes.name: Point2D
classes.description: Represents a point with integer coordinates on a 2D grid, including methods for translation based on direction, equality, hashing, string representation, and generating a random point within specified bounds.

methods.name: translate
methods.description: Returns a new Point2D translated in the specified direction.

methods.name: operator ==
methods.description: Checks equality between two Point2D objects based on their x and y coordinates.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Provides a hash code for the Point2D object based on its coordinates.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the point in the format '(x,y)'.

methods.name: randomWithin
methods.description: Generates a random Point2D within specified width and height bounds.
